resources.string: Notify me when a listener becomes online

p-squared is the anonymous peer-listening chatline for the Johns Hopkins community. We offer a safe space for anyone to discuss anything from everyday frustrations to serious concerns.

 Peer listeners are undergraduate students who have been selected and trained in 50 hours of active listening skills and crisis intervention through the JHU Counseling Center. We are trained to listen and respond without giving advice. We'll help you explore your thoughts and feelings and come up with your own solutions.

 Your conversations are completely confidential and not recorded in any way. We will NEVER talk about you to others
